question: Atal Innovation Mission has partnered with which organisation to launch an AI-based module for school students?
explanation:
NITI Aayogâ€™s Atal Innovation Mission has partnered with NASSCOM to launch an Artificial Intelligence-based module for school students. This module aims to bring AI based technology to the classrooms of the country.
This module is launched as a successor to a similar module launched in February. It contains a set of self-learning attractive modules, which can be easily understood by both rural and urban students.
